WRITING.TITLE: My most recent space station. Loosley based off the ISS, with my own modifications.

WRITING.TEXT: The main station part mods are -Near future construction -Near future solar -Stockalike space station parts Visual mods include -EVE -Scatterer -Astronomers visual pack with 4k textures.
We used to have it in my college. Tasted pretty bad so its gone now.

Its not Scottish or Welsh independence that scares me, if they want it they should be allowed to have. England is no position to stop them. Im more scared of the way our country is heading with foreign trading and crime. From the looks of it our economy may be swimming in the toilet.
How would you go about preparing for your driving test, if you were to learn to drive now?

Its incredibly expensive and dangerous to go to the moon. Nasa currently have plans to return to the moon with SLS but compared with their budget in the 60s, its tiny. They would rather make the next step in space travel and go to Mars and allow private companies to gather whats left to research on the moon.
I don't believe S.O.C.K is on ckan. Its a great mod so i would highly recommend getting it on spacedock.
Yep
r/lostredditors
As long as you connect it with the sata and data cables, then yes it will work.
It does in fact come in black.

WRITING.TITLE: Redditors, what would you like to do this week?

WRITING.TEXT: Well good luck!
Setting the bar quite high with that.

WRITING.TITLE: Shuttle Atlantis sitting on the launchpad.

WRITING.TEXT: Sounds fun. Have a great time!
Thanks! Im using EVE, AVP and Scatterer. It's definitely worth the performance hit.
With all my mods im at about 30fps here, with 60+ in orbit at max settings. Currently running a i7-7700k at 4.5ghz, 16gb ram, RTX 2070 super.
It mostly depends on the part count. Currently getting high 10s with my newest space station. As long as you can enjoy the game, as thats all that matters.
Thanks!
For the visuals i'm using \-Scatterer \-EVE \-AVP (4k textures) For the shuttle and launch tower i'm using \-Shuttle Orbiter Construction Kit \-reDirect \-Modular Launch Pads
Those are stunning!
If you want to go down the political side, you could always mention brexit or scottish/welsh independence. If not, how about talk about the different way tea is made across the UK. /s
Gonna have to ask, which one?
A splendid choice! Another idea could be about the rise of fake news within western countries, and how we are affected by it.
r/doctorwho "*angry noises*"
Idk, im British so maybe its something to do with my genes.
Anything else? Im so close to a bingo.
Nice

Bungee jumping. Who wants to jump to their death, to then be barely saved by a piece of rope wrapped around your legs. If the elasticated rope snaps - dead If the rope extends to far - dead If the rope is too long - dead
You could send a probe with an empty crew capsule. Use the claw to attach to the ship, then transfer the crew member to the empty capsule. Good luck!
Your best (non cheat option) is then to allow the craft to slow while in the atmosphere. It will take ages, so grab some popcorn.
Lmao. My last (stock) option is to upgrade the astronaut complex and push the craft. Tho if it were me, i would probably cheat.
You could either use the built in cheat menu to decrease the orbit, or get yourself a *loan* using the file editor.
Best of luck!
I should of marked it NSFW lmao
